---
name: "DBC Research Ticket Template Kit - 20: Research wrap-up tasks"
about: To guide the variety of tasks for wrapping up a study. 
labels: "disability-benenfits,research" 
assignees: ''

---

### Description
This ticket covers a variety of tasks for wrapping up the [study name] study. The study focuses on [brief description of study]. 

#### Timeframe for this ticket
This work should fit within one sprint.

### Tasks
**Socialize findings:**
- [ ] Share findings and recommendations and discuss them with scrum team
- [ ] Share findings and recommendations with VBA stakeholders (typically during weekly office hours)
- [ ] Share findings and recommendations in Sprint Review
- [ ] Post the final research report in the [#benefits-disability channel](https://dsva.slack.com/archives/C04KW0B46N5) with a quick summary of the most important takeaways (either findings or recommendations) in the text of the slack message itself
- [ ] Reach out to Naomi Marcussen on Slack to get on the calendar to present at the Monday OCTO design/research sync
- [ ] Decide if any additional share-outs are needed (e.g. to other stakeholders)
   - [ ] Work with Sitewide UX Lead, PM, and/or PO to decide and make arrangements
   - [ ] Create additional tickets if needed for preparing a presentation
- [ ] Research Lead, HCD Lead, and VA Enablement partner determine if research is appropriate for presentation during the Monday OCTO content/design/research sync
   - [ ] OPTIONAL: Reach out to Naomi Marcussen on Slack to get on the Monday OCTO sync calendar
- [ ] OPTIONAL: Schedule a research watch party for our enabling team and anyone else on the crew who wants to join

**Research repo:**
- [ ] In the [Research Repo](https://github.com/orgs/department-of-veterans-affairs/projects/880/views/2), drag your study card from Current to Complete
- [ ] Copy Key findings from the research report (copy as markdown) and paste them into the Research ticket
   - You can also include the Detailed Findings if you’d like
   - Make sure to click Edit before you copy the findings so you’re copying the actual markdown
   - Paste the findings at the bottom of the first box in the ticket, under the Key Findings header
- [ ] Verify your study is discoverable via the search bar, and modify the name as needed

**File cleanup:**
- [ ] Review the files on Github and SharePoint, if any. Make sure they are complete, organized, and clearly labeled
- [ ] Check the ReadMe file to make sure all files are linked to the most up-to-date versions
- [ ] Delete any session recordings or transcripts that are stored outside of the shared research folder on SharePoint

### Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] Findings and recommendations have been shared with team and VBA stakeholders
- [ ] The research is scheduled for presentation at the OCTO design/research sync
- [ ] [Research Repo](https://github.com/orgs/department-of-veterans-affairs/projects/880/views/2) is updated
- [ ] Files are cleaned up

### Resources
- [List of related files/ReadMe]
